### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password_hash VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE cards (
    card_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    card_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    security_code VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    card_id UUID REFERENCES cards(card_id),
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id),
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL
);

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password_hash VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE cards (
    card_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    card_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    security_code VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    card_id UUID REFERENCES cards(card_id),
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

    payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id),
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE transactions SET amount=100.25 WHERE transaction_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number INT NOT NULL,
    cardholder_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (payment_id) REFERENCES payments(payment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    detection_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE settlement (
    settlement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    settlement_amount DECIMAL,
    settlement_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE payments SET amount = 100.50 WHERE payment_id = 1;
